info.name: JEP 430 - String Templates (First Preview)
info.dscr: A preview of the String Templates feature, which was updated in JEP 459 and later removed.

info.name: JEP 431 - Sequenced Collections
info.dscr: Adds sequenced collections to the Java Collections Framework, providing a new way to handle ordered collections.

info.name: JEP 439 - Generational ZGC
info.dscr: No executable code, see GenerationalZGC21.java for further info

info.name: JEP 440 - Record Patterns
info.dscr: Simplifying the destructuring of records and improving code readability.

info.name: JEP 441 - Pattern Matching for switch
info.dscr: Enhancing the switch expression with pattern matching capabilities.

info.name: JEP 442 - Foreign Function & Memory API (Third Preview)
JEP 444 - Virtual Threads
info.dscr: Simplifying the handling of concurrency in Java applications by being no longer limited by the OS threads.

info.name: JEP 445 - Unnamed Classes and Instance Main Methods (Preview)
JEP 449 - Deprecate the 32-bit x86 Windows Port for Removal
info.dscr: Deprecated the Windows 32-bit x86 port in JDK 21, signaling its future removal.

info.name: JEP 451 - Prepare to Disallow the Dynamic Loading of Agents
info.dscr: Issues warnings when agents are loaded dynamically into a running JVM to prepare for disallowing this by default in a future release.

info.name: JEP 452 - Key Encapsulation Mechanism
info.dscr: Introduces a Key Encapsulation Mechanism API, aiming to improve cryptographic capabilities.
